about_the_game:
After almost 30 years, the pioneer of 3D platforming has returned!!

Hello, my name is Ishaq Mohamed, better known as the man behind the alias Chem The Chameleon and the owner of the (Twitter/ X) handle @Robbit4life. And I'm a huge fan of the classic franchise 'Jumping Flash!'. To honour its thirtieth anniversary, I created a small vertical slice of a hypothetical 'Jumping Flash 4!' to use it as as a playable pitch to get the attention of the IP owners. It's admittingly a bit basic, but imagine what I can do with a small team to create the Jumping Flash! sequel fans deserved!

What this Concept Pitch contains:


  • An updated recreation of the first level of Jumping Flash!: World 1-1!
  • Powered by Unreal Engine 5.2!
  • Updated Controls suitable for a new audience!
  • A small secret for those a bit nostalgic...

LETS GO ROBBIT! JUMP AND GO!!

After almost 30 years, the pioneer of 3D platforming has returned!!

Hello, my name is Ishaq Mohamed, better known as the man behind the alias Chem The Chameleon and the owner of the (Twitter/ X) handle @Robbit4life. And I'm a huge fan of the classic franchise 'Jumping Flash!'. To honour its thirtieth anniversary, I created a small vertical slice of a hypothetical 'Jumping Flash 4!' to use it as as a playable pitch to get the attention of the IP owners. It's admittingly a bit basic, but imagine what I can do with a small team to create the Jumping Flash! sequel fans deserved!

name: Jumping Flash 4: Return of Robbit | Playable Concept Pitch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-5675C
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 (6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

publishers: Please hire me Jim Ryan/Hiroki Totoki!
short_description: The galaxy is under threat once again after almost thirty years of peace, only Robbit can bring justice! Warning: This is a fan-made game and it is created to seek job opportunities at PlayStation! Follow @ChameleonChem/@Robbit4life for more Info!
